summary: Completed comprehensive testing of House of Neelam jewellery e-commerce application. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend has good design and basic functionality working, but checkout flow and admin dashboard access need fixes.

ui_bugs.issue: Cart items disappear when navigating from product page to checkout, causing redirect back to products page
Admin login succeeds but doesn't redirect to dashboard, stays on login page

integration_issues.issue: Cart state not persisting between routes, preventing guest checkout completion
Login API call succeeds but React Router navigation to dashboard fails

design_issues.issue: Cart drawer overlay intercepts click events, preventing interaction with buttons

passed_tests: Backend API: Orders creation and retrieval
Backend API: Stripe payment session creation
Frontend: Homepage hero section and navigation
Frontend: Products listing with category filters

high_priority: Fix cart state persistence - cart items disappearing during checkout navigation
Fix admin login redirect - successful login should navigate to /admin/dashboard
Fix cart drawer z-index/overlay issues on mobile that block button interactions
medium_priority: Test complete guest checkout flow after cart issue is fixed
Verify admin dashboard functionality once login redirect is working
action_item_for_main_agent.testing_notes: Backend is solid with 100% API success rate. Frontend needs cart state management and routing fixes.
